trans-unit.source: Represents a service that generates a <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlObjectWriter" /> that is based on the current internal parser context.
trans-unit.target: 表示會根據目前內部剖析器內容來產生 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlObjectWriter" /> 的服務。

trans-unit.source: An internal factory class implements this service for .NET Framework XAML Services.
trans-unit.target: 內部的 factory 類別會實作這個.NET Framework XAML 服務的服務。

trans-unit.source: By obtaining the service from an existing XAML object writer, you can call <xref:System.Xaml.IXamlObjectWriterFactory.GetXamlObjectWriter%2A> to construct a new compatible XAML object writer.
trans-unit.target: 藉由從現有的 XAML 物件寫入器取得的服務，您可以呼叫<xref:System.Xaml.IXamlObjectWriterFactory.GetXamlObjectWriter%2A>來建構新的相容 XAML 物件寫入器。

trans-unit.source: The factory-constructed object writer can resume writing to the object graph after the first write operation is suspended.
trans-unit.target: Factory 建構的物件寫入器可以在之後第一個寫入作業已暫停，繼續寫入物件圖形。

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlObjectWriterSettings" /> from the original internal parser context.
trans-unit.target: 從原始內部剖析器內容傳回 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlObjectWriterSettings" />。

trans-unit.source: The settings from the original internal parser context.
trans-unit.target: 來自原始內部剖析器內容的設定。

trans-unit.source: The settings to use for construction and initialization of the <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlObjectWriter" />.
trans-unit.target: 用於建構和初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlObjectWriter" /> 的設定。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlObjectWriter" /> that is based on active XAML schema context.
trans-unit.target: 傳回以作用中 XAML 結構描述內容為基礎的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlObjectWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlObjectWriter" /> that has the specified settings.
trans-unit.target: 具有指定之設定的 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlObjectWriter" />。
